channel.title: xAuth
channel.description:
Ive been skimming through bukkit forums, and i came across someone who linked to this:
http://minecraft.pvp.gs/threads/xauth-enchant-fix-cb-1527.868/
could be the solution to whats holding mitb back from fixing xAuth.
Although i could be wrong because im ignorant when it comes to the workings of minecraft servers/plugins.

item.title: xAuth

item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Ok, hope it works :o

item.title: xAuth
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’ve seen that before, but he offered no source code, so I wasn’t going to use it. Lately though, someone else in the xAuth thread did supposedly ‘fix’ it the same way, and also posted source code which I downloaded. I will check it out.

Read full topic
